changelog:
Cinemax v1.4.1 update includes:
- Performance improvement
- Update bookmarks when a new data is available
- UI fixes
- Better error messages/n- Share link for movies and TV shows
- Share link for news
- Syncing between online bookmark and offline bookmark (for registered users only)
- Quality of life update
- Screen now automatically rotates to landscape mode on streaming for ease of use
- Profile setting like name change, username change, deleting account etc...
Minimum Android version required to run the app: 5.0 or Lollipop and up.
